original_text: It is good to have only a little food and be happy. That is better than too much hard work that gives you a lot of food. It is as useless as somebody who tries to catch the wind. It is good to have only a little food and be happy.
korean_text: 두 손에 가득하고 수고하며 바람을 잡는 것보다 한 손에만 가득하고 평온함이 더 나으니라

sentences.original_text: It is good to have only a little food and be happy
sentences.korean_translation: 적은 양의 음식을 가지고 행복하는 것이 좋다

sentences.original_text: That is better than too much hard work
sentences.korean_translation: 그것은 너무 많은 고된 일보다 더 낫다

sentences.original_text: that gives you a lot of food
It is as useless as somebody who tries to catch the wind
It is good to have only a little food and be happy
sentences.korean_translation: 적은 양의 음식을 가지고 행복하는 것이 좋다
